sig_info: Intercepting the Opponent has a 100% Chance to Purify one of each Debuff from Black Panther. Cooldown 15 to 2.04 seconds.
Each Bleed Debuff on the Opponent decreases their Defensive Ability Accuracy by 2.5 to 7.93%. Max 5 Bleeds.

CRITICAL HITS: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 37.35 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: 100% Chance to gain a Cruelty Passive granting +120.43 Critical Damage Rating for 1.25 second(s). These Cruelty Passives fall off one at a time. Max Stacks: 15
Intercepting the Opponent or striking them while they are recovering from a Heavy or Special Attack grants an additional Cruelty Passive.
When striking into an Auto-Block, Panther is Immune to Stun.
PANTHER'S MIGHT - INACTIVE CHARGES: Dashing back after a non-combo ending attack will grant 1 Indefinite Inactive Panther's Might Charge. Max: 5 Charges
Inactive Panthers Might Charges cannot be gained while Panther's Might is Active.
PANTHER'S MIGHT: Landing a Heavy Attack while at 3 or more inactive charges grants Panther’s Might for 3 seconds per charge consumed.
Intercepting the Opponent or striking them while they are recovering from a Heavy or Special Attack pauses Panther's Might for 5 seconds.
Upon Activation: Gain 1 Precision Passive for each Personal Cruelty Passive active, each increasing Critical Rating by +75.39.
Pause all Personal Cruelty Passives.
While Active:
Bleed Debuffs gain +8% Duration per Personal Cruelty Active on Black Panther.
All Attacks reduce the Opponents Defensive Ability Accuracy by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACKS 1 AND 2: Intercepting the opponent: Each hit of this Attack is a Guaranteed Critical Hit and apply an additional Bleed Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain 3 Inactive Panther's Might charges. Then consume all charges and enter Panther's Might for 5 seconds per charge consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This Attack gains +4.15 Attack Rating for each Personal Cruelty Passive Active on Black Panther.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict up to 5 Bleed Debuffs, with each having a 100% Chance to Apply, and dealing 29.05 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.
Refresh the Duration of Panther's Might.
